definition: ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: Then he got a free ride from a warm-hearted Mexican.
sentences.chinese: 於是，他搭了一位好心的墨西哥人的順風車。

sentences.english: More than 18,000 Mexicans stripped off, baring all for the sake of art.
sentences.chinese: 000餘名墨西哥人脫光衣服，爲了藝術而赤身裸體。

sentences.english: One Mexican family was rousted out of bed in the middle of the night and quarantined.
sentences.chinese: 一家墨西哥人，在半夜被叫醒，然後隔離。

sentences.english: The Day of the Dead is an ancient festival celebrated in Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 鬼節是墨西哥人紀念逝去親人的古老節日。
怎麼了，你不像墨西哥人啊。

sentences.english: The Aztec culture in current day Mexico also prized chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 當今阿之臺克文化中，墨西哥人也珍視巧克力。

sentences.english: I apologised to England and Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 我得向英格蘭和墨西哥人致歉。

sentences.english: Some suggest he saw the Mexicans as a threat to his empire.
sentences.chinese: 有人說他認爲墨西哥人對他的帝國是一個威脅。
“要不了多久”墨西哥人回答道。

sentences.english: But the vast majority of non-Mexicans arrested are from Brazil and Central America.
sentences.chinese: 但絕大多數被捕的非墨西哥人多是來自中美和巴西。

sentences.english: Mexico leads the way in bedroom tidiness.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥人的臥室最整潔。

sentences.english: Is your mother or your father from Mexico?
sentences.chinese: 你母親還是父親是墨西哥人？

sentences.english: More than 70 Mexicans have been quarantined around China, according to Mexican officials.
sentences.chinese: 據墨西哥官員稱，有70多名墨西哥人在中國被隔離。

sentences.english: The Mexicans said they were grateful for our work.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥人說他們感謝我們的工作。

sentences.english: Mexicans seem to like to slice the enemy into pieces at every joint available.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥人似乎要把敵人切成一塊塊的才解恨。

definition: All Saints' Day (Christian festival on 2nd November)
Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡
